statements: DELETE FROM rental_prices WHERE id = 100 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM rental_prices WHERE season = 'Summer' AND rental_price <= 1500
DELETE FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_price > 200 AND rental_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM peak_prices WHERE location = 'New York' AND price < 1000
DELETE FROM rental_history WHERE property_id = 101 AND rental_date < '2021-12-31'
DELETE FROM peak_prices WHERE location = 'New York' AND price > 1000
DELETE FROM rental_history WHERE rental_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_peak_period = TRUE
